title: Configure default hours and availability mode Snapshot

view.title: Configure default hours and availability mode
view.subtitle: Hours/lead-time baseline configured on biz metadata.

blocks.title: Owner Configure Hours completed
blocks.message: Hours/lead-time baseline configured on biz metadata.

resultPayload.note: Hours/lead-time baseline configured on biz metadata.

data.instruction: Update offer publish/lifecycle flags so customer actors can discover it.
data.expectedResult: Offer appears as published/active and can be returned in customer-facing list queries.

requestBody.title: Customer two performs concurrent booking attempt API Trace

data.instruction: Using concrete API reads and persisted state checks, validate this requirement is satisfied: "Stops/multiple destinations allowed". If not satisfied, record exact gap and failing entities/endpoints.
data.expectedResult: Evidence either confirms requirement coverage or captures a precise, reproducible gap.

data.instruction: Create a primary location for the biz and set timezone aligned with scenario context.
data.expectedResult: Location exists and is associated with the new biz.

data.instruction: Update offer publish/lifecycle flags so customer actors can discover it.
data.expectedResult: Offer appears as published/active and can be returned in customer-facing list queries.

data.instruction: Using agents tools, create a biz representing The Tool Rental (Home Depot Style). Use name/slug derived from saga context.
data.expectedResult: Biz is created, owner is auto-added as member with owner role, and biz id is captured.

data.instruction: Update offer publish/lifecycle flags so customer actors can discover it.
data.expectedResult: Offer appears as published/active and can be returned in customer-facing list queries.
